original_title: Cool Cat vs Dirty Dog 'The Virus Wars'
overview: “COOL CAT vs DIRTY DOG Unleashed” is the story of Cool Cat who loves to protect kids, but Dirty Dog hates children. And Dirty Dog is mad because Coronavirus is fading away, so he makes his own Virus to infect the kids – the Dirty Dog Virus!
title: Cool Cat vs Dirty Dog 'The Virus Wars'
